sentences.sentence: What would I get if I added powdered root of asphodel to an infusion of wormwood?
sentences.translation: 如果我把水仙根粉末加入艾草浸液会得到什么？

sentences.sentence: Tumbling head over heels in the asphodel meadows like brown paper parcels pitched down a shoot in the post office!
sentences.translation: 头朝下脚朝天地摔倒在开满水仙花的草原上，就像一捆捆棕色纸袋被扔进邮局的输物管道一样！
